CHAT.comment: IDAHO, Petitioner v. UNITED STATES, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF STEVEN W. STRACK, ESQ. ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF RAYMOND C. GIVENS, ESQ. ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT COEUR D'ALENE TRIBE
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID C. FREDERICK, ESQ. ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENT UNITED STATES
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF STEVEN W. STRACK, ESQ. ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:03 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
